titles.title: To reduce temporarily the duty on PHBA.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

bill.summary: 5/16/2005--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to reduce, through December 31, 2008, the duty on PHBA (p-hydroxybenzoic acid), of a kind used in the production of liquefied crystal polymer (LPC).
